type( ) â€‹

python
a, b, c, d = 1, 2.0, "Hello, world", True 
print(a, type(a), b, type(b), c, type(c), d, type(d))
# 1 <class 'int'>  
# 2.0 <class 'float'> 
# Hello, world <class 'str'> 
# True <class 'bool'>
a, b, c, d = 1, 2.0, "Hello, world", True 
print(a, type(a), b, type(b), c, type(c), d, type(d))
# 1 <class 'int'>  
# 2.0 <class 'float'> 
# Hello, world <class 'str'> 
# True <class 'bool'>

isinstance( ) â€‹

python
print(isinstance("Hello, world", str)) # è¿”å›True 
print(isinstance("Hello, world", int)) # è¿”å›False 
print(isinstance(5,int)) # è¿”å›True 
print(isinstance(3.2, float)) # è¿”å›True 
print(isinstance(True, bool)) # è¿”å›True
print(isinstance("Hello, world", str)) # è¿”å›True 
print(isinstance("Hello, world", int)) # è¿”å›False 
print(isinstance(5,int)) # è¿”å›True 
print(isinstance(3.2, float)) # è¿”å›True 
print(isinstance(True, bool)) # è¿”å›True

end( ) â€‹

ä¸åŒçš„printä¹‹é—´å¸¸ç”¨

python
# endå‡½æ•°

print("hello", end="t") # end = "t" -> ä¸­é—´éš”ä¸€ä¸ªtab
print("next", end="\n") # end="\n" -> æ¢è¡Œ
print("python")

#helloworld	next

sep( ) â€‹

åŒä¸€ä¸ªprintä¸­é—´å¸¸ç”¨

python
print("www","baidu","com") 
print("www","baidu","com",sep=".") 
print("www","baidu","com",sep="\n")

# www baidu com
# www.baidu.com
# www
# baidu
# com
print("www","baidu","com") 
print("www","baidu","com",sep=".") 
print("www","baidu","com",sep="\n")

# www baidu com
# www.baidu.com
# www
# baidu
# com
